# Dominate Living Construct (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living construct

**Duration:** One day/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 184

As the spell *[[Dominate Person (Spell)|dominate person]]**,* except that it affects a living construct.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 5, Wizard 5 to Level.
